message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product at the very reasonable price of $14,000. I believe this offer represents great value given its worth. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm looking to save as much as I can on this purchase.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $11,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $12,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm still a bit far from my target price, but I'm willing to compromise.
